headline: AM Best Assigns Issue Credit Ratings and Indicative Issue Credit Ratings to The Cigna Group
summary: OLDWICK, N.J., September 04, 2025--AM Best has assigned a Long-Term Issue Credit Rating (Long-Term IRs) of "bbb+" (Good) to The Cigna Group’s (Cigna) (headquartered in Bloomfield, CT) [NYSE: CI] new senior unsecured notes. In addition, AM Best has assigned indicative Long-Term IRs on the recently filed shelf registration of Cigna. The outlook assigned to these Credit Ratings (ratings) is stable. (Please see below for a detailed list of the Long-Term IRs.)

headline: Jim Cramer Says He is Going to “Take a Big, Big Monster Pass on Cigna”
summary: The Cigna Group (NYSE:CI) is one of the stocks that Jim Cramer discussed. A caller asked Cramer what he feels about the company, in light of its recent quarterly results and the fact that it is the company with the least exposure to Medicare Advantage of all the managed health care stocks.
